name: Newbie Level
description: Get access to lessons for Newbie level.

name: Beginner Level
description: Get access to lessons for Beginner level.

name: Intermediate Level
description: Get access to lessons for Intermediate level.

name: Advanced Level
description: Get access to lessons for Advanced level.

name: Expert Level
description: Get access to lessons for Expert level.

name: Lifetime Access
description: Continue to have access to all the lessons even after you complete the track.

name: Publish Portfolio Projects
description: The number of portfolio projects you can upload and showcase in your profile.

name: Community Forum
description: Access to discussions that will help you build connection with other members, share knowledge, and discover a wide range of interesting topics.

name: Exclusive Discussions
description: Access to Super members-only discussions in the forum with the most exclusive network of members.

name: Priority Support
description: Get prioritized assistance as you need from real people.

name: Dedicated 1-on-1 Mentorhip
description: Learn better and faster from your own dedicated private mentor with a customized schedule, lessons, and difficulty level that fit your needs.

name: Review and Feedback
description: The number of your work that can be reviewed by our mentors to improve your quality.

name: Project Collaboration
description: Collaborate with the other members and add them as collaborators. Especially to build and publish a project together.

name: Certificate of Completion
description: Receive a certificate that you can share on your profile or to your potential employers and others after you complete a track.

name: Apply for Jobs
description: Discover work opportunities either full-time or freelance.
